DataElement.preferredName: Notification Administration Reuse Template Study Activity Name Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An administrative activity defined at the global library level that represents the communication of a message to a recipient. EXAMPLE(S): An alert sent to a study PI that the study has reached 75% of target subject accrual. A coded value specifying the non-unique textual identifier for the activity. EXAMPLE(S): (1) CPT4 or SNOMED term for a surgical procedure. (2) Coded value for a single analytic procedure in a lab test. (3) The code and text of an individual question on the eligibility checklist of a protocol. NOTE(S): The textual description of the activity is captured in the complex data type.
